column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|

|H20PN-181 系列 PTN CPE|H20PN-181-2GX.4GE-P、H20PN-181-2GX.2GE.4E1-SP|在高性能 L2 交换服务的基础上，提供维护和部署的便利性、多业务支持、运营商级 OAM 管理、可靠的保护机制、QoS 策略、安全机制等服务优化措施，同时具有出色的可扩展性和可靠性。支持最新的运营商以太网属性，兼容 IEEE、ITU 和 MEF 标准。应用分组传输技术，支持完整的 OAM 功能，便于网络管理和维护。QoS 功能扩展了运营商以太网的范围，应用于实时服务，如语音和视频。支持连接导向的 MPLS-TP 技术，支持完整的报警和性能管理功能|

column2: In-band and out-band NM interface setup, telnet client and console port, SNMP V2C/V3, EzView management.
Dying gasp, link fault, remote loopback
IEEE 802.1ag, Y.1731, performance monitoring and fault management, including CC/LB/LT/AIS/LCK/MD/MA/MEP/RME/fault ACK, frame delay measurement, RFC2544 test and in-service test.
Based on port, RFC1213 standard error frame statistics
External clock input, Ethernet line input, CES service input, local clock, external clock 2Mbit/2MHz, G.8262, G.781, using SSM-QL transmitting clock quality by ESMC
MPLS-TP FLOW, MPLS-TPLSP, MPLS-TP TUNAL, CLEAR FLOW STATISTICS, MPLS-LSP OAM,MPLS-TP PW OAM, MPLS-TP segment OAM, protection switch
Six load sharing algorithms: S-MAC, D-MAC, S-MAC+D-MAC, S-IP, D-IP and S-IP+D-IP.
Basic and flexible VLAN, support VLAN switch, outer TPID and inner TPID
WRED(Weighted Random Early Detection), discarding ratio 1%-100%

Monitor optical port connection status and quality and the intelligent optical module’s emission optical power, reception optical power, temperature, work voltage, laser offset current, and other parameters.
Based on IEEE 802.1ab, NMS can quickly master topology and changing conditions of layer-2 network.
System log server information and table
IP ACL, MAC ACL,USER ACL,FILTER,ACL MAP
L2/L3 SLA, L2 network latency/jitter testing, L2 discarding testing
Complying with IEEE 802.3, IEEE-802.3u, IEEE 802.1Q, IEEE 802.1p
Auto-negotiation, 1000M full-duplex, 1000M half-duplex, 100M full-duplex, 100M half-duplex, 10M full-duplex, 10M half-duplex
Complying with IEEE 802.3, IEEE-802.3z, IEEE 802.1Q, IEEE 802.1p, IEEE802.1ad, IEEE802.1d, IEEE802.1w, IEEE802.3ad, IEEE802.3ah, IEEE802.1ag, Y1731
